meta.title: Deploy FastAPI Webhook Server via Coolify
meta.description: Deploy the existing FastAPI webhook server (server.py) to Coolify PaaS platform. The server handles webhooks from the website and triggers Prefect flows for email sequences. Docker configuration already exists; main work is Coolify deployment and DNS/SSL configuration.

waves.name: Coolify Deployment
waves.objective: Deploy webhook server to Coolify using docker-compose.coolify.yml

waves.name: DNS and SSL Configuration
waves.objective: Configure domain and verify SSL certificate

waves.name: Testing and Verification
waves.objective: Test health endpoint, webhook endpoints, and Prefect flow triggers

features.name: Create .dockerignore file
features.description: Create .dockerignore to exclude .git, __pycache__, .env, .venv, tests, .claude directories from Docker image

features.name: Verify Dockerfile.webhook configuration
features.description: Review and confirm Dockerfile.webhook settings are optimal for production

features.name: Verify docker-compose.coolify.yml
features.description: Confirm docker-compose.coolify.yml has correct service configuration, networking, and Coolify magic variables

features.name: Push latest code to GitHub
features.description: Ensure all Docker configuration files are committed and pushed to galacoder/perfect repository

features.name: Create Coolify project for perfect-webhook
features.description: Use coolify-integration skill to create new project in Coolify dashboard

features.name: Configure Coolify Docker Compose deployment
features.description: Add Docker Compose resource pointing to galacoder/perfect repository with docker-compose.coolify.yml

features.name: Configure environment variables in Coolify
features.description: Set PREFECT_API_URL, TESTING_MODE, and any other required env vars in Coolify UI

features.name: Deploy to Coolify
features.description: Trigger deployment and monitor build logs for successful container startup

features.name: Configure domain in Coolify
features.description: Set domain (e.g., api.sangletech.com or webhooks.galatek.dev) in Coolify service settings

features.name: Configure DNS A/CNAME record
features.description: Add DNS record pointing domain to Coolify server IP

features.name: Verify SSL certificate
features.description: Confirm Let's Encrypt SSL certificate is automatically provisioned by Coolify/Traefik

features.name: Test health endpoint
features.description: Verify GET /health returns 200 OK with correct status JSON

features.name: Test christmas-signup webhook
features.description: Send test POST to /webhook/christmas-signup and verify 202 Accepted response

features.name: Verify Prefect flow triggered
features.description: Check Prefect dashboard (prefect.galatek.dev) to confirm flow run was created

features.name: Update STATUS.md with webhook deployment info
features.description: Document the deployed webhook URL in campaigns/christmas_campaign/STATUS.md

features.name: Update WEBSITE_INTEGRATION.md with production URL
features.description: Update webhook documentation with the production API endpoint

session_log.action: EXPLORE phase complete - Docker infrastructure already exists
